args.natural_language_statement: If z1, ..., z_n are complex, prove that |z1 + z2 + ... + z_n| ≤ |z1| + |z2| + ... + |z_n|.

open ComplexConjugate Topology Filter

/-- If $z_1, \ldots, z_n$ are complex, prove that $|z_1 + z_2 + \ldots + z_n| \leq |z_1| + |z_2| + \cdots + |z_n|$. Save it to: Rudin_exercise_1_12.lean -/

args.content:
import Mathlib
open ComplexConjugate Topology Filter

/-- If $z_1, \ldots, z_n$ are complex, prove that $|z_1 + z_2 + \ldots + z_n| \leq |z_1| + |z_2| + \cdots + |z_n|$. -/
theorem abs_sum_le_sum_abs (n : ℕ) (z : Fin n → ℂ) : 
  Complex.abs (∑ i, z i) ≤ ∑ i, Complex.abs (z i) := by sorry
